text: "Ice in the Sun" is a 1968 song by British band Status Quo and is the third single from their debut studio album Picturesque Matchstickable Messages from the Status Quo. It went to number 8 in the United Kingdom, number 70 in the United States, number 29 in Canada, number 17 in Ireland and Germany and number 48 in Belgium and Australia. ==References== Category:1968 songs Category:Status Quo songs Category:Psychedelic rock songs
title: Ice in the Sun
